title: How to fight against fiddlestick on bot lane
body: as the tiltle fiddlestick is a very annoying champion he spam e like crazy on bot lane and make poeple cant even play

replies.body: How I play fiddle sticks support. Walk into their jg at level 1. Throw an E, it bounces between supp and Adc or supp adc and jg. Great, now their bot lane is at 1/2 health by the time they get to lane.

1)Don't stick close together to your Ally
2) take ignite
3)if he targets you with a crow or a crow bounces on you, walk away from minions and allies and position yourself in a spot where you can walk away quickly

I play fiddle supposed and play against it. Against it, I have had luck with heavy pokers and sustainers like Sona and soraka. They can heal off his crows while getting in a strong attack causing him to waste Mana on his heal or use pots.

For adc's auto attacking adc's can't punish well if he walks up, caster adcs and Cait punish him well for walking to e a wave.

Dont stand near someone when the wave is low, or he can get free 4-6 hit E.

Try to minimize bounces by leading it out of range during travel time, or to an isolated minion.
